title-group.article-title: Author Correction: Global vulnerability of marine mammals to global warming

body.p: Correction to: Scientific Reports 10.1038/s41598-019-57280-3, published online 17 January 2020
This Article contains errors in the legend of Figure 2.
“Each bubble is proportional to the level of functional originality (i.e., the measure of the extent to which a given species is functionally unique among the global marine mammal fauna).”

“Each bubble is proportional to the level of evolutionary distinctiveness (i.e., which represents the relative contribution of a species to the evolutionary history of the global marine mammal fauna).”

“Each bubble is proportional to the level of evolutionary distinctiveness (i.e., which represents the relative contribution of a species to the evolutionary history of the global marine mammal fauna).”
“Each bubble is proportional to the level of functional originality (i.e., the measure of the extent to which a given species is functionally unique among the global marine mammal fauna).”
